name: Home Free (itch)
description:
You search for keys in a dark forest while hiding from a monster.

Your only goal is to get inside your home but the keys are all over the forest. 

Find the keys and get home before you die.

Can you survive the cursed forest of Home Free...

The amount of gameplay depends on you.

This Game contains jumpscares and loud noises you were warned.

Also make sure that you read controls in the main menu.
